property.name: gp.accept.license.agreement
property.description: By setting this value to yes, you agree you have read and accepted the Greenplum Database license agreement. Installation will not occur if value is 'no'.

property.name: gp.installer.zip.file.location
property.description: The absolute file path of where the Greenplum installer zip file is on the master host.

property.name: gp.installation.path
property.description: The absolute path to the install location. You must have write permissions to the location you specify.

property.name: gp.admin.user
property.description: The Greenplum system user used to administer the Greenplum Database. The user will be created on all Greenplum hosts.

property.name: num.segments.per.host
property.description: Number of segment servers to create on host
